import React from 'react' import Typed from 'react-typed'; const Hero = () => { return (

GROWING WITH DATA ANALYTICS

Grow with data

Fast, flexible financing for

Monitor your data analytics to increase revenue for BTB,BTC, & SASS platforms.

) } export default Hero
